item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-1 Chances: Lyft is showing potential for growth and expansion with the introduction of new marketing strategies and partnerships with companies like Oracle and Nielsen. The stock has seen significant gains in the past year, indicating investor confidence in the company’s performance. The Federal Open Market Committee’s decision to leave the policy rate unchanged at 5.
